title: MILF: Wrong Kind of Love
description: A story of forbidden love with a side of revenge... When my husband of nearly twenty years abruptly left me for another woman, I thought my life was over, But I was wrong. Wrong for thinking I was weak, Wrong for assuming I couldn't go on, Wrong for believing I'd never love again. No matter what anyone else thinks, Wrong never felt so right. ***Only intended for readers 18+ due to explicit sexual situations and foul language***
author: Erin Noelle
